title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Introducing the Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle by The Republic of Tea! Indulge in the delightful flavors of autumn with this irresistible tea bundle, featuring 36 count tea bags each of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea.

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend that captures the essence of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. With ingredients like apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, and more, this comforting blend will transport you to cozy evenings by the fireplace.

The Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that combines the sweetness of apples and the richness of vanilla with a base of South African Rooibos. Savor the decadent flavors of caramel and apple in every sip, perfect for satisfying your dessert cravings.

Steeping these teas is a breeze! Simply bring your water to a rolling boil, add 6 oz of water, and steep for 5-7 minutes. And here's a bonus tip - after brewing, you can add the used tea bags to your compost or soil, making it an eco-friendly choice.

With 36 count tea bags of each flavor, this bundle is ideal for accompanying you throughout the harvest season and serving as a delightful dessert tea. So go ahead and treat yourself to the Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle by The Republic of Tea. Embrace the flavors of fall and elevate your tea-drinking experience.

Introducing The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each! 

Indulge in the flavors of the harvest season with our exclusive bundle of Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. This limited-edition bundle includes 36 tea bags of each flavor, ensuring you never run out of your favorite fall teas.

Our Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend that perfectly captures the essence of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Each sip will transport you to a cozy autumn day, wrapped in the comforting warmth of this delightful brew. Made with a blend of high-quality ingredients, including apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, and more, this tea is a delicious treat that can be enjoyed any time of the day.

For those with a sweet tooth, our Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that combines the luscious flavors of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos. This decadent tea is the perfect dessert companion, offering a rich and satisfying taste that will satisfy your cravings without any guilt. With ingredients like Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract, every sip is a pure delight.

Preparing your tea is a breeze with our simple steeping instructions. Just bring your water to a rolling boil, add 6 oz of water to your tea bag, and steep for 5-7 minutes. For an extra eco-friendly touch, you can even add your used tea bags to compost or soil, reducing waste and nourishing the earth.

Don't miss out on this limited-edition fall bundle! With 36 tea bags of each flavor, you can enjoy the taste of autumn all season long. Whether you're cozying up by the fire or hosting a gathering with loved ones, our Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle is the perfect addition to any fall occasion. Order now and experience the warm and comforting flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea.

Our Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend that perfectly captures the essence of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. It's the ultimate autumnal treat to cozy up with. Made with high-quality ingredients like apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, and more, this tea is a comforting delight.

The Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that combines the sweetness of apples, the richness of vanilla, and the smoothness of South African Rooibos. It's like sipping on a caramel apple dessert, but without the guilt! Crafted with ingredients like Rooibos, apple bits, and natural apple and caramel flavors, this tea is a truly indulgent treat.

Steeping these teas is a breeze. Just bring your water to a rolling boil, pour 6 oz of water over your tea bag, and steep for 5-7 minutes. And here's a little tip - once you're done steeping, you can add the used tea bags to your compost or soil for a sustainable touch.

With 36 tea bags in each bundle, you'll have plenty to share with friends and family or to enjoy throughout the fall season. Whether you're looking for a warm and comforting cup of apple cider or a sweet and decadent caramel apple tea, this Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle is the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season and a delightful dessert tea.

Don't miss out on this seasonal treat! Grab your Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle today and experience the flavors of autumn in every sip.

With 36 count tea bags each, this bundle is perfect for enjoying throughout the fall season.
